Jessica Coleman-it was NOT aimed at you, so don't take it so personally & I WAS NOT calling this dad a narcissist, so I was not presuming anything actually. It was a general statement about anyone who feels the need to constantly video tape themselves doing anything & putting it out there for everyone, that's called narcissism, look it up. It wasn't directed at one person.

Dear God, can't you people separate your personal, anecdotal experiences, from the aggregate data that is accumulated by the studies. Have you not heard the phrase """"exception to the rule."""" I'm glad your formula fed baby is smart, but that doesn't negate the conclusions drawn from the study. The inability to recognize this is incredibly self centered and reflects a serious lack of critical thinking ability.

They don't rig it directly, that would be too dangerous if this gets leaked. But they are closing down voting stations denying independents to vote in closed primaries, demanding weird ID laws. give the other candidate more airtime on tv and so on. They use other means. The US government is not stupid, they know how to rig it without giving it the appearance of being rigged.
